attributes.action: encourage the church to make entry to cathedrals free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every government has something to be proud of - one of PM Blair administration's positive achievements was to make museums free - please can Gordon Brown follow on from this and make entrance to Britain's cathedrals on a voluntary contribution basis.

And Jesus cast the tax collectors out of the temple !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
